opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Trobaugh v. Hawk Sawyer, Director, Federal Bureau of Prisons

opinion:
535 U.S. 901

TROBAUGH
v.
HAWK SAWYER, DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF PRISONS, ET AL.

No. 01-7124.

Supreme Court of the United States.

March 4, 2002.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8. Reported below: 19 Fed. Appx. 461.
